Info.TextInfo: 3x3 squares will be cleared from the board and generate energy.
Blocks adjacent to cleared squares become Waste, each draining 1 energy per move.
Waste that is adjacent to cleared squares levels up. Level 2 Waste drains 3 energy each move.
This Waste block has become level 3 and will drain 5 energy each move.
You’re running out of energy! Make a square this turn or you’ll lose!
An event has begun! Each event continues until you clear 5 squares.
Reactor Breach: A breach has occurred in the reactor and foreign material is taking up space.
Unrefined Uranium: Some budget cuts mean you have to place some less than perfect blocks on the board.
Contamination: Your material has become contaminated and now blocks will spawn with wastes in them.
Reactor Meltdown: The reactor is melting down! Be prepared for multiple events at once!
Reactor Overload: The reactor has completely overloaded! All the events are occurring at once! This is your final challenge!
Multiple overlapping 3x3 squares can be cleared at once.
Use the Waste to complete this 3x3 square. Use the buttons to rotate and flip it.
This bar tracks cleared sqaures and shows when events will start and end.
Blocks diagonal to completed squares won’t become Waste!
